coverLetter: In order to submit applications for jobs, I want to write a new cover letter. Please compose a cover letter describing my technical skills. I've been working with web technology for 8 years. I've worked as a frontend developer with React for 5 years. I've grown by employing some tools. These include HTML, CSS, JavaScript/TypeScript, React, Nodejs, AWS, and so on. I wish to join a passionate team of strong engineers to yet further develop my full-stack development skills. Can you write a cover letter for a job application about myself?
business-names: can you come up with a list of business domain names for a hypothetical web development freelancer? for the names please use clever references from computer science, the universe, history, science fiction, or web technology
resume-font: can you suggest the best body/header font pairing for a resume?
resume-critique-opener: are you able to critique my resume as a software engineer and provide suggestions to improve it? if so, what format do you want the resume? is PDF ok?
